backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, push subscriptions, radio stream checks, and request logging with access-control enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence record linking a UI change to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend files and their functionality.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_DEBUG.md: Debug notes outlining a TypeScript build failure caused by Node.js typings in the frontend.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point configuring PWA meta tags, Google Cast SDK, and a fallback recovery UI for slow app mounts.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining metadata, theme colors, icons, and shortcuts for Mawalking Radio.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker managing caching, activation cleanup, and push notification handling with versioned caches.
frontend/README-verify.md: Brief guide describing how to run the frontend verification script.
frontend/scripts/verify-frontend.mjs: Node.js script that checks for browser-incompatible typings, runs TypeScript checks, and validates asset paths before deployment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing playback state, navigation, notifications, and error boundaries for the radio app. Includes global hooks, screen routing, and UI-level error handling.
frontend/src/components/CastControl.tsx: Chromecast control button that starts or stops casting the stream and shows connection status. Tracks cast events and displays toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: PWA install prompt logic handling iOS/Android detection, beforeinstallprompt events, and dismissal timers. Shows platform-specific installation guides when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Renders a mobile bottom tab bar with Home, Shows, and Settings navigation.
frontend/src/components/player/MiniPlaye: Shows a compact player with album art, track info, and play/pause control.
frontend/src/components/player/VolumeSli: Provides a slider UI to control and sync audio element volume.
frontend/src/components/PushNotification: Panel for enabling and displaying the status of web push notifications, including subscription flow and error handling.
frontend/src/components/RequestForm.tsx: Modal form for submitting song or shout‑out requests, with validation, mutation handling, and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/ServiceWorkerRec: Banner alert offering refresh or reset options when a service worker update or loading error occurs.
frontend/src/components/ShareButton.tsx: Share button using the Web Share API with a fallback modal for copying the app link to the clipboard.
frontend/src/components/shows/ShowCard.t: Displays show details including image, description, genres, and schedule in a clickable card.
frontend/src/components/status/LiveBadge: Shows a red animated LIVE badge with a radio icon.
frontend/src/components/status/OnAirIndi: Small pulsing dot indicating on‑air status.
frontend/src/components/TrackNotificatio: Displays a styled track notification with dynamic theming based on type and optional dismiss action.
frontend/src/data/mockShows.ts: Defines the Show interface and provides mock show data for testing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppLifecyclePlayba: Handles resuming audio playback after visibility, focus, or bfcache lifecycle changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChromecast.tsx: Manages Chromecast API initialization, session handling, and casting state for a stream URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavoriteStation.ts: Stores and toggles a boolean favorite state in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling AuthClient setup, login flow, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Watches now playing metadata to detect track, mix, or live changes and triggers browser notifications with deduplication and permission handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePushSubscription.t: Manages Web Push subscription flow, including permission requests, service worker interaction, VAPID setup, and storing subscription data via backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching the stream URL, checking availability, retrieving now-playing data, and a placeholder mutation for submitting requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceWorkerRegis: Handles service worker registration, update checks, error tracking, and provides utilities to apply updates or fully reset the service worker and caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useSleepTimer.ts: Implements a sleep timer that counts down and pauses an audio element when time expires, with start and cancel controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: React hook managing screen wake lock acquisition, release, and recovery on visibility changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining dark theme variables and responsive background/overlay behavior.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry mounting React root with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/screens/BrowseShowsScreen.t: UI for browsing mock shows with genre and day filters and a selectable show list.
frontend/src/screens/HomeLiveScreen.tsx: Home screen displaying live radio status with play controls, error handling, and station info.
frontend/src/screens/NowPlayingScreen.ts: Now Playing view showing track metadata, album art, play controls, volume, and sleep timer.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsAboutScreen: Settings screen providing notification controls, background-cache refresh, and about information.
frontend/src/screens/ShowDetailScreen.ts: Renders a detailed view for a selected show with image, info, genres, and actions to add an event to the calendar or request reminders.
Captures early startup errors, classifies critical ones, and displays a recovery overlay when thresholds are exceeded.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Provides safe wrappers for Google Analytics event tracking, including specific helpers for audio and casting events.
frontend/src/utils/ics.ts: Generates and downloads an ICS calendar file for a show by computing the next occurrence and formatting event data.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeArtworkUrl.t: Normalizes raw artwork URLs into validated HTTPS URLs, handling relative and protocol‑relative forms.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, screens, animations, and theme settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requests, versions, and overall project state.
